ygData.subject: Re: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Bit confused but the high level undead spawn every night? Does that mean they are still dropping good items? Naeeldar ... From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal
ygData.messageBody:
Bit confused but the high level undead spawn every night? Does that mean
they are still dropping good items?

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, October 31, 1999 11:53 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?


>From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
>On Mon, 1 Nov 1999, Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) wrote:
>
>> Where did you hear this? The Plane of Hate hasn't been opened
>> yet. The surge in undead around the land was for Halloween. You'll
>> see things returning to normal now that it's over.
>
>Hate to be the bearer of bad news, but Antonica will never be the same
>again. Qeynos Hills and our little quiet haven of Kithicor now run
>rampant with undead after the sun sets. The Carson McCabe of CazicThule
>warned us that this was a permanent change, and that the link to the Plane
>of Hate had been "weakened" due to this incident. He did not tell us
>where the gateway was, rumors include somewhere in Kithicor and deep
>inside Neriak Third Gate.
>
>Arguably the most humorous part of last night's proceedings was when
>Carson ran around killing guards and looting them, saying that they had
>stolen money from the vault, so he could continue handing out his 20p
>reward to each person present.
>
>Did anyone get a bardic item from him? There were a few classes he seemed
>to overlook when handing out the non-monetary gifts.
>
>Athren Notechaser, mood indigo
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
